<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Opossum](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=252)</title>

**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 192

Few creatures have survived as long and in as many environments as the opossum. 

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Giant Opossum](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1253) (Creature 2), [Khravgodon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1254) (Creature 9)
